titles.title: A resolution relating to monetary policy.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12632)
Referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 8/25/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that in the immediate future it would be a mistake to raise interest rates further, and that the Secretary of the Senate shall transmit a copy of this resolution to the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System.
